mapper.select: SELECT GUID, DEALID,ORDERID,NAME,DBCOLUMNNAME,DATATYPE,DATALENGTH,SCALE,CSID,ISPRIMARY,ISLOGICKEY,ISRESERVE,DEFAULTVALUE,DEID, ISVISIBLE, ISUPDATE FROM dict_t_defaultcol WHERE STATUS='1' ORDER BY ORDERID

SELECT GUID, DEALID,ORDERID,NAME,DBCOLUMNNAME,DATATYPE,DATALENGTH,SCALE,CSID,ISPRIMARY,ISLOGICKEY,ISRESERVE,DEFAULTVALUE,DEID, ISVISIBLE, ISUPDATE FROM dict_t_defaultcol
DEALID = #{dealid} AND STATUS='1'
ORDER BY ORDERID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_t_defaultcol ( GUID, DEALID, ORDERID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, CSID, ISPRIMARY, ISLOGICKEY, ISRESERVE ,DEFAULTVALUE,DEID, ISVISIBLE, ISUPDATE) VALUES ( sys_guid(), #{dealid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbcolumnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datalength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isprimary,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{islogickey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isreserve,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvisible, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isupdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dict_t_defaultcol
NAME = #{name},
DBCOLUMNNAME = #{dbcolumnname},
DATATYPE = #{datatype},
DATALENGTH = #{datalength},
SCALE = #{scale},
CSID = #{csid},
ISPRIMARY = #{isprimary},
ISLOGICKEY = #{islogickey},
ISRESERVE = #{isreserve},
DEFAULTVALUE = #{defaultvalue},
DEID = #{deid},
ISVISIBLE = #{isvisible},
ISUPDATE = #{isupdate},
GUID = #{guid}
mapper.select: SELECT GUID , DEALID,ORDERID,NAME,DBCOLUMNNAME,DATATYPE,DATALENGTH,SCALE,CSID,ISPRIMARY,ISLOGICKEY, ISRESERVE,DEFAULTVALUE,DEID, ISVISIBLE, ISUPDATE FROM DICT_T_DEFAULTFACTORTCODECOL u ORDER BY ORDERID

SELECT GUID , DEALID, ORDERID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, CSID, ISPRIMARY, ISLOGICKEY, ISRESERVE, DEFAULTVALUE, ISVISIBLE, ISUPDATE, (select name from dict_t_modelcode where tableid=CSID) AS SNAME_CSID, (select name from fasp_t_dicde where guid=DEID) AS SNAME_DEID, decode(ISPRIMARY,'1','${YES_CODE}','${NO_CODE}') AS SNAME_ISPRIMARY, decode(ISLOGICKEY,'1','${YES_CODE}','${NO_CODE}') AS SNAME_ISLOGICKEY, decode(ISRESERVE,'1','${YES_CODE}','${NO_CODE}') AS SNAME_ISRESERVE, DECODE(ISVISIBLE, '1', '${YES_CODE}', '${NO_CODE}') AS SNAME_ISVISIBLE, DECODE(ISUPDATE, '1', '${YES_CODE}', '${NO_CODE}') AS SNAME_ISUPDATE FROM dict_t_defaultcol u WHERE STATUS='1' AND DEALID = #{dealid} ORDER BY ORDERID
SELECT DBCOLUMNNAME FROM Dict_t_Defaultcol WHERE DEALID = #{dealID} AND DBCOLUMNNAME NOT IN (SELECT DBCOLUMNNAME FROM Dict_t_Factor WHERE TABLEID =#{tableId})
SELECT DBCOLUMNNAME FROM dict_t_defaultcol u WHERE STATUS='1'AND DEALID = #{dealid} group by dbcolumnname having count(1) > 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DICT_T_DEFAULTCOL WHERE DEALID = '${dealID}' AND STATUS = '1'
